overview: Fattouh leaves the university until he works to change the currency and the heroin trade. Surprised that his girlfriend Soso became addicted. A Zionist organization for the smuggling of narcotics shows Fattouh to his discovery of the Egyptian scientist Dr. Nomani, a serum to purify the blood of addiction. Fattouh decides to take revenge on his addicted girlfriend. He decides to beat the members of the organization who kidnapped Dr. Nomani and help the police reach their headquarters.
title: ستوب
